meanings.definition: (verb) to add monounsaturates to a diet for heart health
meanings.sent1: She decided to monounsaturate her meals by using olive oil instead of butter.
meanings.sent2: It is important to monounsaturate your cooking oils for a healthier lifestyle.
meanings.sent3: John thought he could monounsaturate his way to a six-pack by switching to avocado oil.
meanings.sent4: By monounsaturating her recipes, Sarah's heart thanked her for the healthy change.
meanings.sent5: Monounsaturating your diet can be a simple step towards better heart health.

meanings.sent1: The nutritionist recommended a monounsaturate diet for better heart health.
meanings.sent2: Eating a monounsaturate-rich diet can help lower cholesterol levels.
meanings.sent3: The monounsaturate-rich salad was a hit at the potluck.
meanings.sent4: Her glowing skin was a result of her monounsaturate-rich meals.
meanings.sent5: Switching to a monounsaturate-rich diet can have numerous health benefits.

meanings.sent1: Include monounsaturates like olive oil in your diet for a healthier heart.
meanings.sent2: Monounsaturates are known for their positive impact on cardiovascular health.
meanings.sent3: The avocado is a delicious source of monounsaturates.
meanings.sent4: Her favorite snack was a handful of almonds rich in monounsaturates.
meanings.sent5: Remember to incorporate monounsaturates into your meals for a balanced diet.
